trans-unit.source: You can run the procedure described in <MadCap:xref href="Repair_Clean_Up_Missing_or_Corrupted_blocks.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fixing Missing or Corrupted Blocks</MadCap:xref> if:

seg-source.mrk: You can run the procedure described in <MadCap:xref href="Repair_Clean_Up_Missing_or_Corrupted_blocks.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fixing Missing or Corrupted Blocks</MadCap:xref> if:

target.mrk: Vous pouvez exécuter la procédure décrite dans <MadCap:xref href="Repair_Clean_Up_Missing_or_Corrupted_blocks.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fixing Missing or Corrupted Blocks</MadCap:xref> si :

trans-unit.source: A restore process fails and reports missing or corrupted blocks.

seg-source.mrk: A restore process fails and reports missing or corrupted blocks.

target.mrk: Un processus de restauration échoue et signale des blocs manquants ou corrompus.

trans-unit.source: You checked your system health (hardware issues or file system corruption.

seg-source.mrk: You checked your system health (hardware issues or file system corruption.

target.mrk: Vous avez vérifié l'état de votre système (problèmes matériels ou corruption du système de fichiers).

trans-unit.source: This section describes the available repair tools used in the procedure to check, repair, and clean up your data in case of missing or corrupted blocks.

seg-source.mrk: This section describes the available repair tools used in the procedure to check, repair, and clean up your data in case of missing or corrupted blocks.

target.mrk: Cette section décrit les outils de réparation disponibles utilisés dans la procédure pour vérifier, réparer et nettoyer vos données en cas de blocs manquants ou corrompus.
